title: LividRivet
author: LividRivet
content: Hello. I have been scouring the forum and various other sources for bitcoin/altcoin websites that offer Poker (specifically No Limit Texas Hold Em) for a while. I used to use Blockchain.Poker for a while, then it got shut down and the creators haven't released the source code or even a reason as to their closure. I saw sites like SwC being mentioned, but the information on sites like this seems to be spread quite thin due to a lot of the gambling sites focusing on sports betting. I was wondering if anybody had any experience with sites akin to Blockchain.Poker that offer a similar registration requirement (just a username + password and a 2FA option) and low rakes? Or was BC.P just a unicorn and there isn't any like it? I apologize if this topic is a duplicate, I tried searching for similar topics but I wouldn't be shocked if I missed one in the sea of results. Thank you.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I play a lot on americas cardroom. Officially americascardroom.eu I believe. Takes bitcoin deposits gives fiat balance and allows many different crypto wd options. No kyc either so its a plus to those who value privacy.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: I used to play a long time ago but got turned off by the full tilt scandals and all of the collaborating on tables.  I just always feel like I'm getting taken for a ride on those sites anymore.  Too many times when a player plays a certain way and magically folded everytime at the exact right time just too fishy.  Will check out that site as well.  How's the action there?  A lot of different tables to choose from?
